Software Demo

Provided here is a demo of the software. Select field dimensions and track width to run the simulation. The selected area will be sent for processing and a analytics report will be displayed.
Field Area must be less than 160,000 meters squared
(ie. 400x400 or 40 acres)





Additional Simulation Parameters Value
Position Drifts On
Position Jumps On
Easting Drift Per Kilometer 0.04 (m)
Northing Drift Per Kilometer 0.04 (m)
Jump Occurance Probabality 0.02 %
Easting Jump Magnitude 0.18 (m)
Northing Jump Magnitude 0.12 (m)
Tractor Speed 8 (km/hr)
Epoch Frequency 1 (epoch/sec)
